TopicTitle: How can I make ship tiles bigger?

Articles.Content:
The images stored are 256x256, displayed uses about 50x50

I would love it if there was some setting to increase the displayed image.

Comparison:

Problem is I wind up with lots of crap ships and I can't tell what they are with the tiny tile.

Would be a lot easier to delete them if I did not have to load them first

A good naming scheme helps.

"Moon Express Mk 2", "Duna Shuttle A, Orbital Lifter 20t or something like this gives you an idea what your ship was build for.

And personally I delete all "lower" iterations of my crafts regularly, because newer is always better. ^^

I don't know you can enlarge the displayed thumbnail without an external mod.

But I also think they are too small.

Squad should introduce a mouse hover function to show them in full resolution.
Just like the the comment section is visible in the load screen for sub assemblies it should be too for complete ships.
